testcase.name: test/fixtures/fail.scss
testcase.failure: test/fixtures/fail.scss:1 [W] Class `Button` in selector should be written in all lowercase as `button`
test/fixtures/fail.scss:2 [W] Properties should be sorted in order, with vendor-prefixed extensions before the standardized CSS property
test/fixtures/fail.scss:3 [W] Color `black` should be written in hexadecimal form as `#000000`
test/fixtures/fail.scss:4 [W] Files should end with a trailing newline
